nodes.documentation:
@title Base Contract for Wolsuki. Holds all common structs, events and base variables.
 @author Wolsuki (https://www.wolsuki.com)
nodes.name: WolsukiBase
validValue

nodes.documentation:
@dev A valid guess for a bet is between 1 and 3 where:
   1 => home team wins
   2 => away team wins
   3 => draw
 If a player tries to place a bet whose guess is either greater than 3
 or smaller than 1, the transaction will be reverted.
 For example, a guess of 0 will result in transaction error.
 Similarly if the player tries to place a bet with guess 10 ( > 3), an error
 will be thrown for that transaction as well.
nodes.name: validGuess

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct WolsukiBase.Pool storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.name: queryBetValue

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct WolsukiBase.Pool storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.name: queryBetClaimed

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct WolsukiBase.Pool storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.name: queryPlayers
